full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 759 Filed 08/10/22 Page 214 of 267 2242
LCACmax7 Mulligan - cross
1 CROSS-EXAMINATION
2 BY MS. STERNHEIM:
3 Q. Good afternoon, Mr. Mulligan.
4 A. Hello.
5 Q. You're telling this jury things you remember from over 25 years ago; correct?
6 A. That's correct.
7 Q. You remember individuals' names?
8 A. Yes.
9 Q. And you've retained that over 25 years?
10 A. Yes.
11 Q. And you've talked with Ms. Farmer about this?
12 A. Over time, yes.
13 Q. And you've also seen things in the media about it?
14 A. Some things, yes.
15 Q. Well, you must have been curious if there were things in the media about your close friend, Ms. Farmer; correct?
16 A. Yes, but I'm not much of a news watcher, so --
17 Q. Well, put news aside. There were documentaries involved in this case; correct?
18 A. Yes.
19 Q. And you're aware of those documentaries; correct?
20 A. Yes.
21 Q. And Annie told you she was in certain documentaries, didn't she?
22 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00016430

text_blocks.content:
CROSS-EXAMINATION
BY MS. STERNHEIM:
Q. Good afternoon, Mr. Mulligan.
A. Hello.
Q. You're telling this jury things you remember from over 25 years ago; correct?
A. That's correct.
Q. You remember individuals' names?
A. Yes.
Q. And you've retained that over 25 years?
A. Yes.
Q. And you've talked with Ms. Farmer about this?
A. Over time, yes.
Q. And you've also seen things in the media about it?
A. Some things, yes.
Q. Well, you must have been curious if there were things in the media about your close friend, Ms. Farmer; correct?
A. Yes, but I'm not much of a news watcher, so --
Q. Well, put news aside. There were documentaries involved in this case; correct?
A. Yes.
Q. And you're aware of those documentaries; correct?
A. Yes.
Q. And Annie told you she was in certain documentaries, didn't she?

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and legible format. There are no visible redactions or damage.
